version_description:
We work hard to deliver the best customer experience. Our latest update includes a fresh redesign, a variety of bug fixes, and several usability improvements.

Our mission is to make sure you're all set for life - whether that means never running out of toilet paper or staying stocked up on your favorite snacks #nomnomnom. Our app makes shopping for your essentials in bulk easy like Sunday mornings (mmm, pancakes). Don't forget to add free samples to your order. Go on, #tapthatapp!

We work hard to deliver the best customer experience. Our latest update includes a fresh redesign, a variety of bug fixes, and several usability improvements.

Our mission is to make sure you're all set for life - whether that means never running out of toilet paper or staying stocked up on your favorite snacks #nomnomnom. Our app makes shopping for your essentials in bulk easy like Sunday mornings (mmm, pancakes). Don't forget to add free samples to your order. Go on, #tapthatapp!

We work hard to deliver the best customer experience. Our latest update includes several bug fixes.

Our mission is to make sure you're all set for life - whether that means never running out of toilet paper or staying stocked up on your favorite snacks #nomnomnom. Our app makes shopping for your essentials in bulk easy like Sunday mornings (mmm, pancakes). Don't forget to add free samples to your order. Go on, #tapthatapp!

- Facebook Login is live! This will streamline the sign-up process for those of you who are new (and thanks for checking us out!), and current users can enjoy a seamless sign-in experience
- We improved the Shop tab so it's easier for you to get to the products and categories you love the most
- Speaking of the new Shop tab, don't forget to check out Your Picks for a curated list of products we hope you'll enjoy (thanks data science team!)
- Nobody's perfect, we also had to fix a few bugs, one related to wine (did you know we sell wine, depending on your state?) - Don't forget, if you live in one of our Express delivery zones, you can always force touch the app icon to check the next available delivery time for your zip code, pretty convenient right?

- Remember what our old featured tab looked like? Neither do we, it was that boring. We revamped it to make it easier and faster to find the items you love!
- Before you check out, don't forget to add your free samples and occasionally we'll even have some Last Minute Deals available, customized for you.
- Speaking of a custom selection, have you checked out Top Picks For You yet?
- Spring is in the air, check out our Sweet Life wine selection featuring a sparkling Rose we think you'll love. (Eligible zip codes only.)
- Ever seen our Boxed Selfies? Sometimes your box will snap a photo of itself before it leaves the fulfillment center. Anyway, we had to fix a small bug on that so it should be working again, look out for it in your news feed!

- Introducing Bundles: our team has created some awesome pre-bundled boxes to bring you both time and huge savings! Snacks, kitchen supplies; you name it, we got it. Simply tap on a bundle and press Bundle Checkout to start your purchase.
- Improved: Our old customer on-boarding was clunky and unnecessary. Like the spud in your mother’s July 4th potato salad recipe, we’ve mashed it up, trimmed it down and made it easier to digest.
- Improved: The old add to cart button in every gallery has been replaced with a literal ‘Add’ button. In case you ever miss the little guy, Mr. Plus Button can still be found in the cart.
- Fixed: Sorry! We don’t ship to PO Boxes or APO/FPO boxes :(. We’ve added a gentle reminder in checkout.

- Introducing SMARTstockup: Let our app help you restock! Our secret fairy remembers the items you order and alerts you when they’re almost used up. A little banner at the bottom of your screen will show up if she thinks you’re running out. The days of getting caught on the toilet staring at an empty toilet roll in despair are over! Say goodbye to digging your toothbrush into the cap of your toothpaste!
- Improved: New User Tutorial updated with some minor changes.

15% off when you shop www.boxed.com or Boxed’s mobile app, enter code APPLEPAY at check-out and use Apple Pay for payment. Offer valid for new and existing Boxed customers. Limit one offer per account. Starts 12:01am Eastern Time on 8/3/2017. Expires 11:59 pm Eastern Time on 8/10/2017.  Minimum order $19.99 to checkout (excluding sales tax, if applicable). Max discount $50. Boxed reserves the right to modify, replace, or cancel offer at any time. Offer may not be combined with other offers, promotions or discounts. Offer is not valid for cash or cash equivalent. Offer not valid on prior purchases. New customers must create an account to redeem offer. Standard terms and conditions apply (www.boxed.com/terms-conditions/).

-Improved: we've made it easier for our friendly Customer Service team to help you by creating new forms to fill out when you have a suggestion, question or issue. You can find them in the Help/Contact section in the Account tab in the bottom bar.

We've made a few updates to the Bundles tab so it's easier for you to see what's important: the SAVINGS!
In case you missed it, Boxed Bundles are some of our favorite items, packaged strategically to arrive on your doorstep in one, chock-full box.

Our hearts go out to our neighbors impacted by Hurricane Harvey and Hurricane Irma. Here’s what Boxed is doing to support families in need -- and how you can help.

What we're doing:
Boxed is donating critical supplies to local evacuation shelters around our Dallas fulfillment center and will support organizations addressing the immediate needs in Florida and the wider region in the days to come. We've also donated 4,800 bottles of Pureau water to 4 Red Cross shelters on the Texas Gulf Coast to date.

How Boxed customers can help:
Purchase a Boxed Bundle on the Bundle tab which sends directly to a shelter housing those impacted. We will be rolling out relief packages over the coming weeks, filled with the essentials most required.

Let's continue to be there for our customers, friends, family, and neighbors in the region.

Improvements:
-Last Minute Deals are BACK! Check out our exclusive items in checkout, calculated to fit your Boxed box, maximizing savings and minimizing wasted space!
-Did you know? Half of our users who install our Boxed app have already created an account on boxed.com. We added a Login button in the tutorial so you can sign in without going through the extra steps :).
-We added some banners in our category pages to brighten up your day!

Bug Fixes:
-Oops... in the Shop section of the Home tab, if you had previously shopped with Boxed, you'd be able to see a Re-Order icon that takes you to all of your previously purchased items. It was gone, but like the crisp air and golden leaves of autumn, it's back!

Improvements:
-Hate it when an item you love is running out and you don’t realize until you try to check out? We do too! We’ve added “Last Few” badges on all of our items in the galleries and carts if our warehouses are running low.
Bug Fixes:
-How do you feel about the iPhone X’s new notch? Anyhoo, we’ve adjusted our designs for a cleaner experience.

- Learn about some of our favorite brands in our Shop tab. Simply click on a category like Grocery to see which brands we’re currently featuring.
- American Express Pay with Points - got points to redeem? Either add an American Express card or use an existing one in checkout to see your available points. Enter a quantity, submit and we’ll credit your American Express balance after you place your order!

- Learn about some of our favorite brands in our Shop tab. Simply click on a category like Grocery to see which brands we’re currently featuring.
- American Express Pay with Points - got points to redeem? Either add an American Express card or use an existing one in checkout to see your available points. Enter a quantity, submit and we’ll credit your American Express balance after you place your order!

- Learn about some of our favorite brands in our Shop tab. Simply click on a category like Grocery to see which brands we’re currently featuring.
- American Express Pay with Points - got points to redeem? Either add an American Express card or use an existing one in checkout to see your available points. Enter a quantity, submit and we’ll credit your American Express balance after you place your order!

- Ever been afraid to commit to a jar of nuts because you didn’t know when it’d expire? Fear no more; we’ve added expiration dates inside each product page. Simply tap into a page, look for the Expiration Date section and tap on “When does this product expire?” to see our best estimate.

- Ever been afraid to commit to a jar of nuts because you didn’t know when it’d expire? Fear no more; we’ve added expiration dates inside each product page. Simply tap into a page, look for the Expiration Date section and tap on “When does this product expire?” to see our best estimate.

Introducing Group Ordering! Shopping is better together. You can now shop with friends, family, roommates and more by starting a Group Order in Boxed. Your pals don't need an account to shop with you, just send them a link and they can add their own items to your Group Order. Crowd source snacks for the office. Stock the apartment without fighting over who forgot the toilet paper. Let your partner add their favorites while you add yours. Tap at the top of your cart to get started with Group Ordering.

Introducing Group Ordering! Shopping is better together. You can now shop with friends, family, roommates and more by starting a Group Order in Boxed. Your pals don't need an account to shop with you, just send them a link and they can add their own items to your Group Order. Crowd source snacks for the office. Stock the apartment without fighting over who forgot the toilet paper. Let your partner add their favorites while you add yours. Tap at the top of your cart to get started with Group Ordering.

Download the Boxed app to get 20% off your order of $60 or more with code: USEAPPLEPAY when you pay with Apple Pay. Offer valid for new Boxed customers only.  Limit one per household. Begins 11:59 ET on 4/4/2018 and expires 11:59 pm ET on 4/18/2018. Max discount of $50. Boxed reserves the right to modify, replace, or cancel offer at any time. Offer may not be combined with other offers, promotions or discounts. Offer not valid on previous purchases or Boxed Hotels. New customers must create an account to redeem offer.  Standard terms and conditions apply (www.boxed.com/terms-conditions/).

-Featuring Boxed Up - our loyalty program that provides you with access to exclusive perks such as FREE shipping on all orders, 2% Cash Rewards, special promotions, giveaways, and experiences from our partners and suppliers. You can try Boxed Up for free over a 30-day period and it will be available for purchase at $49/year. Remember, Boxed Up loyals will get access to special perks via this premium offering but all customers can still shop at Boxed without joining Boxed Up.

Featuring Boxed Up - our loyalty program that provides you with access to exclusive perks such as FREE shipping on all orders, 2% Cash Rewards, special promotions, giveaways, and experiences from our partners and suppliers. You can try Boxed Up for free over a 30-day period and it will be available for purchase at $49/year. Remember, Boxed Up loyals will get access to special perks via this premium offering but all customers can still shop at Boxed without joining Boxed Up.

- Highlight banners: we added a banner in the Home tab so you can stay up to date with any urgent updates or outstanding news, such as progress in our fight against Pink Tax or delivery changes due to inclement weather.
- If you are an iPhone X snob (just kidding), we’ve made the app easier to use by adding more separation between our bottom tab and the bottom bar.
- Noticed the Featured Brands were missing? After a short but lovely vacation, they are back stronger than ever in this latest update.

- Real-time cart updates. Whoa. Watch the magic happen as you add an item in your group order and see it magically appear in your friend's phone or computer right away all the day.
- There's nothing like the thrill of finding a last-minute deal. We've added exclusive items to the Group Ordering checkout page so you can experience ADVENTURE in the comfort of your own home.
- We've fixed seven deadly bugs in our iPad app. The first one to list all 7 correctly in an email to kkuo@boxed.com wins $500 in Boxed credit! (Please title your email "iPad Bugs")

Earning Box Tops has never been easier or more rewarding. We partnered with Box Tops to create the first ever completely integrated online Box Tops program that lets you earn more and keep track of your earnings. Link your Box Tops account to start earning Bonus Box Tops at Boxed.

Introducing:
- Occasions! Planning a Labor Day weekend getaway? Or a backyard BBQ? Boxed has created shopping lists for specific occasions in your life so you can plan out what to do and who to do it with, instead of what you'll need to bring or serve. These lists are completely configurable; you can easily delete shopping list terms that don't apply or add terms that are relevant to you. Try them in the tab furthest away from Featured!
- California Proposition 65 is a law designed to warn Californian consumers about substances that may cause cancer and/or birth defects. Your health and awareness is one of our top priorities; therefore, we've added a Prop 65 section to all products which contain such substances.

- Imagine yourself riding a horse, galloping gracefully in circles with the wind in your face. You hear the joyous sound of children's laughter in the background. Aren't carousels the greatest? Well, we've added a Similar Items carousel alongside the Customers Also Bought section in every product page so you can stay stocked up easier.
- There was an issue where you couldn't zoom in on any of the product page images. Since then we've complimented every product and built up their self-esteems, so now you can get up close and personal without them feeling shy. (And if you hadn't noticed then move along, nothing to see here.)

- "What was my password again? Was it 'ilovekitties' or 'ILoveKitties123'? Did this app need capital letters or numbers?" SAVE YOUR TIME. We're happy to announce that Google Sign-In is now available on Boxed. Use your Google account to create an account or to login to your Boxed account with the same email address. You can also link an existing Boxed account to a Google account with different emails in the Account section.
- We added a banner in the Free Samples section. Tap on it. I dare you.

Did you know? Our trucks leave our fulfillment centers every day at 5pm. So while it's possible you live somewhere that takes 1 day to deliver to, if you order too late in the day, you could end up waiting for an extra business day :(

But don't fret! Check your cart to see if you can catch the truck. If you're in time for 1-day shipping, we'll let you know!

HOLD ONTO YOUR PHONES!* We're so excited to provide you with an updated app experience. Re-immerse yourself in wholesale shopping simplified with bolder texts, lighter backgrounds, and easier shopping. We know you'll love it.

*Boxed is not liable for any damages resulting from hearing this news, neither dropped phones nor jaws.

- In case you're still unsure about what Boxed does: we sell grocery items and household essentials in bulk sizes delivered to your door in 1-2 days. But for all the people who missed that last sentence, we revamped our onboarding experience to make it really, really clear. But I guess if you missed that first sentence, that means you're not really reading this... are you?
- We changed up the navigation so you can get to what you care about faster. Check out the bottom tabs on the app! Home, Shop, Search, Favorites, Account. All this power at the tip of your fingertips... kinda makes you feel like an all-powerful purple alien with a name that rhymes with 'sopranos'.
- Speaking of the Shop section, we wanted to make sure you could get to the products you cared about as quickly as possible. So we pruned our categories like a gardener tending to her bushes. No more wasting time looking through flat water just to buy some sparkling - they're under different categories now. We know it doesn't sound like a big deal but that's just how much we care about you :(.

Thank you for using Boxed during this time! We update our app regularly to improve the speed and usability of our app, making sure it's easy and fast as you shop for the items you need most.

This release includes:
-A refreshed home screen so you can see your latest order and scroll through our fresh content
-Support for coupons, a new feature we will be releasing soon. Keep your eyes peeled!
-Less visible performance enhancements and bug fixes
